articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Vegetable Science and Floriculture Institute
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Vegetable Science and Floriculture Institute
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the enlarged Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute and Pyongyang Floriculture Institute. 
					 The first leg of his guidance was the vegetable science institute. 
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the builders expanded the greenhouse capacity and radically increased the production true to the instructions given by leader Kim Jong Il while visiting the institute in March 2011. 
					
					 He dropped in at the nutritive liquid supply room and computer control room. Watching the vegetable cultivation through an automatic injection of various nutritive liquid, he was pleased that a sure guarantee was made for boosting the vegetable production by establishing a production system based on the latest technology. 
					
					 At the bio-engineering room he said he was greatly satisfied to learn that everything was put on a scientific basis. 
					
					 At the experimental plots for research he was pleased to hear that it was conducting researches into more than 50 vegetable species including 20 odd species of tomato sent by himself. 
					
					 He recollected that Kim Jong Il instructed the institute to cultivate a lot of round eggplants, Phyonggang radish, etc. on an experimental basis while visiting it in March last year, adding that he was well versed in vegetables, too. 
					
					 He stressed the need to cultivate a lot of high-yielding species of tasty and highly nutritive vegetables suited to the climatic and soil conditions of the country so as to supply sufficient quantities of vegetables to the people. 
					
					 Only when geothermal, solar heat and wind power energy are widely used for heating greenhouses, is it possible to reduce production cost and ensure profitability in operating them, he noted. 
					
					 It is very nice to go round the vegetable science institute and it looks like a sea of greenhouses, he said, stressing the need for all provinces to build such greenhouses. 
					
					 He expressed expectation that the scientists and employees of the institute would achieve great successes in researches and production of vegetables before having a photo taken with them. 
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the Pyongyang Floriculture Institute built on an expansion basis.
					
					 After being briefed on the institute in front of a large map showing its panoramic view, he acquainted himself with researches and production there.
					
					 He expressed his great satisfaction over the fact that the institute increased its production capacity more than 20 times than that in the past, making it possible to send lots of flowers to the flower shops.
					
					 He was pleased to hear that the institute bred 20 odd new species of flowers to be registered as national species after it was honored to receive the field guidance by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 After seeing cymbidium growing in a greenhouse, he instructed to breed lots of such flower blooming for a long time. 
					
					 At a room for manufacturing floral products, he was pleased that the institute successfully made floral products with reference to the books he sent to it, adding it would be possible for the flower shops to make floral products including floral baskets and bouquets in the future.
					
					 As the Day of Mother was instituted in the country, it would be nice to buy flowers and present them to mothers and housewives on that day, he said.
					
					 He instructed the institute to import world-famous species of flowers and acclimatize them to the climatic and soil conditions of the country.
					
					 He underlined the need for the floricultural research field to actively learn from good experience of other countries.
					
					 He also called for putting the flower booming on a scientific and industrial basis.
					
					 He had a photo taken with the scientists and employees of the institute.
					
					 He extended his thanks to the teaching staff and students of Kim Il Sung University, soldier builders, scientists and employees for their patriotic devotion to the construction of the Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute and the Pyongyang Floriculture Institute.
					
					 He was accompanied by Jang Song Thaek, Kim Ki Nam, Ri Jae Il, Ri Ryong Ha, Pak Thae Song, Kim Pyong Ho and Pak Chun Hong.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Armenian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Armenian President
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greeting to Armenian President Serge Sarkissian on the national holiday of Armenia.
					 Kim expressed his conviction that the friendly relations between the DPRK and Armenia will further develop, wishing the president success in his work for the country's development and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Maltese President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Maltese President
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent greetings to Maltese President George Abela on Friday on the occasion of the 48th anniversary of independence of Malta.
					 Kim in the message wished the president and the people of Malta successes in their work for the country's development and prosperity.
					
					 He expressed his belief that the relations between the DPRK and Malta would develop in the interests and desires of the two peoples.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets Nicaraguan FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets Nicaraguan FM
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a message of greeting to Nicaraguan Foreign Minister Samuel Santos Lopez on Friday on the occasion of the 191st anniversary of independence of Nicaragua.
					 The message expressed conviction that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to grow.

articles.title: Delegation of International Affairs Institute Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of International Affairs Institute Back Home
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International Affairs Institute headed by Director Jang Yun Gon came back home on Friday after visiting Mongolia.

articles.title: Foreign Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Foreign Delegation Arrives
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Eurasia-Pacific UNINET led by Vice-Chairman Wolf-Dieter Rausch arrived here on Friday to take part in the joint academic seminar of Kim Il Sung University and the Eurasia-Pacific UNINET.

articles.title: Study Tour of Oun Revolutionary Site Made
articles.content:
Study Tour of Oun Revolutionary Site Made
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Officials of the university youth leagues across the country and university students in Pyongyang made a study tour of Oun Revolutionary Site on Friday to mark the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's guidance to the military camping exercise of students of Kim Il Sung University.
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Ryongnam Hill and paid tribute to him.
					
					 A meeting for starting the tour was held before the departure.
					
					 Ri Hyon Min, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, in his speech said all the officials of the youth league and university students should deeply grasp Kim Jong Il's leadership feats through the study tour and devote their enthusiasm to the grand march for ushering a heyday of the country's prosperity true to the leadership of the party.
					
					 At the end of the meeting they left for Oun-dong, singing in chorus  "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un with Our Lives ", "Forward for Final Victory", etc. 
					
					 Upon their arrival there they were briefed on the site in front of the Oun Revolutionary Museum. 
					
					 They looked round the historic relics and buildings.
					
					 Then followed a poem recital and oratorical meeting.

articles.title: Future of Sino-DPRK Friendship Hinges on Youth
articles.content:
Future of Sino-DPRK Friendship Hinges on Youth
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The friendly relations between China and the DPRK are developing, said Wang Hongyan, member of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League of China.
					 Wang, who is leading a youth friendship delegation of China, said the friendly relations between the two peoples have a long history.
					
					 The Sino-DPRK friendship was provided and developed by the leaders of elder generations of the two countries, Wang said, adding:
					
					 The friendly ties have been strengthened through centuries.
					
					 The exchange and cooperation between the two peoples have been boosted with each passing day under the deep care of the top leaders of the two countries.
					
					 The exchange between youth organizations is playing an important role in developing the bilateral relations.
					
					 The Chinese delegation was welcomed by the Korean people and youth everywhere it visited.
					
					 It witnessed the diligent and brave Korean youth striving to win final victory.
					
					 The Korean youth have made laudable achievements in building a thriving socialist nation, rallied behind the Workers' Party of Korea led by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The delegation also learned valuable experience the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League acquired in the work for educating youth in patriotism.
					
					 It is an invariable policy of the Communist Party and government of China to constantly develop the Sino-DPRK friendly relations.
					
					 The future of the Sino-DPRK friendship hinges on the youth of the two countries.
					
					 Wang underlined the need to continue boosting cooperation and exchange between the youth organizations in China and the DPRK.
					
					 He expressed a willingness to make contributions to developing the friendly ties.

articles.title: Oath Made by Kim Jong Suk in Chechangzi Guerrilla Zone
articles.content:
Oath Made by Kim Jong Suk in Chechangzi Guerrilla Zone
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- It was in the Chechangzi guerrilla zone on September 18, Juche 24 (1935) that Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero, joined the Korean People's Revolutionary Army commanded by President Kim Il Sung.
					 Upon receiving a rifle, she took an oath to remain intensely loyal to Kim Il Sung with the weapon associated with blood of martyrs and people's desire for national liberation. And she said that she would regard the rifle as valuable as a hundred ones and consider one bullet as a hundred bullets in fighting with the enemy. The day was the beginning of her career as an anti-Japanese war hero.
					
					 On the day, Kim Jong Suk declared that she would not lay down arms until the victory of the revolution and, with the rifle on her shoulder, would return in triumph to the homeland together with Kim Il Sung.
					
					 True to this oath, she creditably aided the President with arms all her life, making distinguished contributions to winning victory in the anti-Japanese war and building a new Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Feats in Army Building
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Feats in Army Building
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The Korean revolution was started and advanced victoriously with arms, and its long history is associated with the undying feats of Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero.
					  Nam Kyong Chon, first deputy curator of the Korean Revolution Museum, told KCNA:
					
					 "It was Kim Jong Suk's steadfast faith to achieve the national liberation and accelerate the final victory of the revolution by force of arms.
					
					 Since she started her career as a revolutionary in her teens, she had devoted her all to the military affairs for freedom and liberation of the country.
					
					 During the anti-Japanese armed struggle, she displayed her marksmanship, mysterious strategy and courage in many battles, including the battles in Xinancha, Laoling, Liudaogou, Liukesong and Jiaxinzi.
					
					 After the country's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule, she had dedicated herself to building the regular army.
					
					 To lay a foundation for the defence industry, she made guidance tours of a munitions factory several times and paid big efforts to training military officers at Pyongyang School and other military academies.
					
					 She also worked heart and soul to building air, naval and tank forces, true to President Kim Il Sung's line of building the Juche-based revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk's feats for the Songun (army-first) revolution will remain forever in the nation's history along with the DPRK's dignity."

articles.title: Haemaji Restaurant in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Haemaji Restaurant in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- There is Haemaji Restaurant in Changjon Street newly built in the heart of Pyongyang City.
					 The restaurant has bread and coffee shops, built in an elegant and peculiar style.
					
					 Put on sale at the bread shop are varieties of local and foreign bread.
					
					 Customers can take instantly-roasted bread or order birthday cakes there.
					
					 The coffee shop is decorated in a way of giving comfort and convenience to customers.
					
					 Kim Hyang Mi, a waitress of the restaurant, told KCNA that respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, on his visit to the shop, said it was built in a comfortable way in keeping with the features of coffee shop.
					
					 Soft drinks are served there, together with fast food and various liquors, including cocktail.
					
					 Ri Myong Song, a Pyongyang citizen, said that the shops are much to his liking.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Earliest Possible Ouster of S. Korean Traitors
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Earliest Possible Ouster of S. Korean Traitors
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Only when the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors of south Korea, the root cause of disasters, is eliminated as early as possible, can the Korean nation live in peace and the independent reunification, peace and prosperity be achieved.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 It is a matter of time to throw into a dumping ground of history the group of traitors who threw a stumbling block in the way of compatriots' struggle for independent reunification, peace and prosperity, regarding confrontation with fellow countrymen as physiology, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean conservative regime is not only an anti-reunification clique without an equal as it has desperately pursued its confrontation policy, swimming against the trend of the June 15 era of reunification, but the worst group of warmongers that escalated the danger of a new war to the maximum through its deliberate and premeditated military provocations.
					
					 The conservative group suspended the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, rapidly bringing the inter-Korean relations to a collapse.
					
					 The "May 24 measures" taken by the group with the conspiratorial case of the "Cheonan" warship sinking as a momentum are still blocking visits, contacts, cooperation and exchange between the north and the south.
					
					 The group of traitors steeped in its unconditional repugnance towards compatriots has frantically kicked up off a conspiratorial "human rights" racket aimed at malignantly hurting the dignity and social system in the DPRK.
					
					 Persistently regarding compatriots in the north as "its principal enemy" to be eliminated by force of arms, not as partners for dialogue and cooperation, the group has frantically stepped up the arms build-up and joint military exercises in collusion with the U.S. in a bid to mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK. 
					
					 The group seriously got on the nerves of the DPRK while leveling guns at the compatriots grieving over the great loss to the nation and finding fault with even the celebrations of the Day of the Sun with such spate of vituperation as "it claimed enormous expenses". The puppet regime's madcap hideous provocations led to the politically-motivated state-sponsored terrorism against the DPRK unprecedented in history.
					
					 It is the steadfast will of the army and people of the DPRK to mete out a merciless punishment to the group of traitors and achieve national reunification.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Flails S. Korean Anti-DPRK Mental Education
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Flails S. Korean Anti-DPRK Mental Education
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- "Test concerning forces following the north" being conducted by the military of south Korea among officers and men of the army has triggered off public denunciation.
					 More than 120 questions and answers worked out by the military are consistent with the content of terming pro-reunification and democratic forces of south Korea "forces following the north".
					
					 The officers and men of the puppet army are obliged to sit for the examination to answer "questions for recognition and evaluation of entities following the north" and those who have not passed it are reconsidered in promotion and furlough.
					
					 Through this, traitor Lee Myung Bak and the "Saenuri Party" seek to instill repugnance toward pro-reunification and democratic forces into the military and create atmosphere favorable for winning in the upcoming "presidential election".
					
					 "Examination regarding pro-north forces" is just a farce to win votes for the military in the upcoming election.
					
					 The "Saenuri Party's" stay in power is directly related to the military in prolonging its days.
					
					 The south Korean military, pursuant to the Lee regime's hostile policy toward the DPRK, leveled guns at the fellow countrymen who were grieving over the great loss to the nation. It even insulted the dignity of the supreme leadership of the nation and committed other hideous provocations.
					
					 It has resorted to fascist acts of tyranny reminiscent of the "yusin" era, ruthlessly violating justice and conscience of south Korean society. It backed with arms the traitorous regime that offered the south Korean land to outsiders as a theater for a nuclear war.
					
					 Fearing that the day when it has to stand trial is drawing near, Lee and top military officials have made every possible effort to remain in office with interests in it.
					
					 The foolish "examination" is part of its moves to justify the "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 It is also for this purpose that the regime has imbued the military with provocative consciousness, talking about the scale of the "pro-north forces" and saying that the north is interfering in the "presidential election". 
					
					 The revival of "yusin" dictatorship is the revival of fascist military dictatorship.
					
					 Lee and the military who committed crimes throughout the course of their office are finding their way-out in reviving the dictatorship.
					
					 It is precisely for this reason that it is conducting the mental education in the military and has made desperate efforts to make the soldiers convince that forces opposed to "yusin" are "pro-north forces".
					
					 The unwarranted moves of Lee and the military are bound to misfire amid censure and denunciation of south Koreans.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams US-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams US-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- It is said that the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces carried out drills of actually preempting an attack on the DPRK and occupying it during the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises in August, according to foreign media reports.
					 This has brought to light the deceptive nature of their claim that UFG is an "annual drill for defence".
					
					 The DPRK has already solemnly clarified its stand regarding the war drill in the light of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and the prevailing military and political situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un's inspection of island defence detachments in the southernmost part in the southwestern front and the order given by him to wage a great war for national reunification were a great historical declaration reflecting the requirement of the prevailing situation and the will of the army and people of the DPRK to annihilate the enemies.
					
					 This declaration shook the world, and the strong will of the Koreans to retaliate against the enemies if they provoke turned the enemies' attempt to ignite a new war into dust and ashes. The enemies were pushed into a tight corner even before the start of the war exercises.
					
					 The U.S., which was going on the rampage, and the south Korean puppet regime, which was making a false show of power counting on its master, were put in low spirits since the outset. When the war racket reached "decisive phase", they called for suspending or resuming it under the pretext of "damage by typhoon", giving it up of their own accord in the end.
					
					 The warmongers suffered a shame in the world eyes. This was due treatment for the reactionaries of history who were going reckless, unaware of who their rival was.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean regime, oblivious of the lesson of their shame, are still persisting in the hostile policy toward the DPRK, a war policy, while watching for a chance to launch a new war.
					
					 They are speaking in public that the exercises to which the concept of "preemptive exercise of right to self-defence" has been applied helped "round off actual scenario".
					
					 It is peddling rumor that similar war scenario will be applied to Key Resolve joint military exercises due early next month, fanning up a war fever.
					
					 The war drills scheduled to be staged in the sky, land and seas of the Korean Peninsula and surround areas following UFG and nuclear war means hurled into them indicate the upcoming final battle with the U.S. 
					
					 The DPRK will never remain an on-looker to the U.S. increasing hostile moves against the DPRK but take active steps to cope with them.
					
					 Songun Korea will promptly retaliate against enemy's provocation and answer an aggression war with a just war for national reunification.
					
					 If enemies fire even a bullet into the area of the DPRK side, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will never miss the golden opportunity but lead it straight into a great war for national reunification.
					
					 This war will be a praiseworthy act of removing the root cause of all evil that harasses the world, and an admirable military feat that will shine long in history.

articles.title: S. Korean Lawmaker Lays Bare Purpose of Naval Base Construction
articles.content:
S. Korean Lawmaker Lays Bare Purpose of Naval Base Construction
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- A lawmaker from the Democratic United Party of south Korea released information on Sept. 10 that a naval base on Jeju Island is aimed to ensure the portcall of nuclear aircraft carriers of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces.
					  He said:
					
					 A "report of investigating and testing the construction of naval base on Jeju island" worked out by the navy in April 2010 says that "it carried out its main task to examine the security and feasibility of the original plan from the viewpoint of operating 150,000-ton-passenger ship and nuclear aircraft carrier according to the plan of base construction".
					
					 Another document worked out earlier said that facilities were designed in such a way as to ensure safe entry and departure of nuclear aircraft carriers.
					
					 The fact that the turning diameter of the naval base on Jeju Island is just the same as the turning diameter of an aircraft carrier suggests that the base is aimed not just to ensure the simple portcall of an aircraft carrier but ensure the permanent entry and departure of those carriers. 
					
					 The U.S. is now in the process of reorganizing armed forces with main emphasis on the navy and more than 60 percent of them are concentrated on Asia. It is contrary to common sense that this construction has nothing in common with the construction of the naval base on Jeju Island.
					
					 The naval authorities should get verification of the propriety of the base construction.
					
					 On Sept. 7, he held at a session of the "National Assembly" that the Jeju naval base was designed to handle the nuclear aircraft carrier which the south Korean forces do not possess.

articles.title: Crackdown on Reunification Organizations in S. Korea under Fire
articles.content:
Crackdown on Reunification Organizations in S. Korea under Fire
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Intelligence Service and police Thursday launched a frantic oppression of branch organizations of the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification on charges of violation of "Security Law".
					 They searched houses, offices and four other places that belong to leading members of the organizations in Taegu, Puchon and Kunsan.
					
					 They tried hard to scour for data proving the organizations' violation of SL, charging them with holding a meeting for showing sympathy with the north's claim, posting "enemy-benefiting documents" on a website and calling for concluding a peace treaty, driving U.S. troops out of south Korea and reunifying the country by federal formula.
					
					 The oppression intended to quell the south Koreans' growing demand for reunification through alliance with the north reveals the Lee Myung Bak regime's true colors as a group of traitors engrossed in confrontation with fellow countrymen.

articles.title: DPRK's 64th Birthday Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's 64th Birthday Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Foreign TV and radio broadcasting services aired special programs on Sept. 8 and 9 to mark the DPRK's 64th anniversary. 
					 Democratic Congo TV gave a detailed account of the Korean people's significant celebrations of the 64th birthday of the DPRK showing portraits of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un attending the ceremony for the completion of the Rungna People's Pleasure Park. 
					
					 The domestic channel of the Guinean Radio said September 9 was the anniversary of the DPRK, founded by President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea. 
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un, creditable successor to the cause of Kim Jong Il, is working heart and soul to enable the Korean people to lead a happier life with no more to desire in the world as early as possible, the radio noted, and went on:
					
					 The Korean people will build a rich and powerful country in the near future under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The International Radio and the 7-Language Radio of Guinea told the same story. 
					
					 The Equatorial Guinean Radio said that the DPRK had covered the road of victory and glory under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and Chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il since the very day of its foundation. 
					
					 The DPRK is now making a dynamic advance for social progress holding the dear respected Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the supreme leader, it said, adding:
					
					 The government and people of Equatorial Guinea warmly congratulate the Korean people on the 64th birthday of the DPRK and are convinced that they will achieve great successes in the drive for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Celebrated in Cambodia, Uganda, Netherlands
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Celebrated in Cambodia, Uganda, Netherlands
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Cambodia and Uganda on Sept. 10 and 11 to mark the 64th anniversary of the DPRK. 
					 The editor-in-chief of the Cambodian Newspaper Pracheachon said that President Kim Il Sung founded the DPRK, socialist Korea
					
					 The might of the DPRK is closely associated with his august name, he said, adding that leader Kim Jong Il increased its might in every way by pursuing the Songun politics. 
					
					 The chief of the Group for the Study of Songun Politics of Kampala Coloro Higher Middle School in Uganda said under the wise leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un the DPRK is fully demonstrating the might of the Songun politics. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The DPRK is now bringing about epochal changes in building a thriving nation. All this was provided by the great leaders of the DPRK who founded the Juche idea, Songun idea and glorified them. 
					
					 Under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un the Korean people will surely build a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the Day of the DPRK was marked with splendor at the 2012 Netherlands Venro World Horticultural Expo on Sept. 11.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Internet Website of French Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Internet Website of French Organization
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The full text of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Only Victory and Glory Are in Store for Us Advancing under the Uplifted Immortal Banners Bearing Portraits of Smiling Great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il" was posted by the French Group for the Study of the Juche and Songun Idea on its Internet website.
					 This speech made by Kim Jong Un at the banquet given in celebration of August 25, 2012 clarifies the Songun feats of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					  It calls for making a dynamic struggle to achieve the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun pioneered by Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and led to victory by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Activities Given Publicity in China and Japan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Activities Given Publicity in China and Japan
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- China and Japan Monday conveyed the news that the dear respected Kim Jong Un enjoyed together with Pyongyang citizens grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang", winner of Kim Il Sung Prize.
					 The Chinese News Service said:
					
					 Supreme leader of the DPRK Kim Jong Un enjoyed re-represented grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang".
					
					 The extravaganza "Arirang" impressively represented the past in which a definite end was put to the distress-torn history of the nation and the present of Songun Korea in which its dignity has been placed on the highest level thanks to the outstanding great leaders and its rosy future.
					
					 It clearly showcased the development of arts in the DPRK through a perfect combination of graceful and spectacular rhythms, dynamic gymnastics, refined artistic representation rich in national flavor, ever-changing background, gorgeous stage decor, peculiar lighting, etc.
					
					 At the end of the performance fireworks were displayed in succession, beautifully decorating the nocturnal sky above Pyongyang.
					
					 Kim Jong Un waved back to the enthusiastic cheers of the performers and audience and congratulated the performers on their successful performance.
					
					 The Phoenix Satellite TV Holdings Ltd., Hong Kong and other various Internet homepages of China and Kyodo News of Japan aired the similar news.

articles.title: China's Representations over Japanese Landing on Diaoyu Islands
articles.content:
China's Representations over Japanese Landing on Diaoyu Islands
 Beijing, September 20 (KCNA) -- China on Tuesday made representations to Japan over two right-wing activists' landing on the Diaoyu Islands. 
					"Japanese right-wing activists' illegal landing on the Diaoyu Islands is a serious provocation that infringes on China's territorial sovereignty," Foreign Ministry spokesman Hong Lei said.
					
					 Hong urged Japan to take effective measures and stop any act that may intensify tension over the islands.

articles.title: Chinese Defense Minister Denounces Japan, US for Unreasonable Behaviors
articles.content:
Chinese Defense Minister Denounces Japan, US for Unreasonable Behaviors
 Beijing, September 20 (KCNA) -- Minister of National Defense of China Liang Guanglie, member of the State Council, at his talks with the U.S. secretary of Defense on Tuesday vehemently denounced Japan and the U.S. for their unreasonable behaviors.
					 Japan is entirely to blame for the complicated issue of Diaoyu Islands, Liang Guanglie declared, adding that China can never accept Japan's illegal method of "nationalizing" the islands.
					
					 China will closely follow the future developments, he said, stressing that it has the right to take a stronger measure.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 China is resolutely opposed to the U.S. claim that the U.S.-Japan security pact is applied to the islands. The U.S. should fulfill its commitment that it would not insist on its stance on the issue of return of the sovereignty of the islands.

articles.title: China Voices Strong Dissatisfaction over Attack on Consulate General in Japan
articles.content:
China Voices Strong Dissatisfaction over Attack on Consulate General in Japan
 Beijing, September 20 (KCNA) -- China on Tuesday voiced strong dissatisfaction over an attack on one of its consulate general offices in Japan.
					 "We have lodged solemn representations to Japan," said Foreign Ministry spokesman Hong Lei at a regular press briefing, as some Japanese threw two smoke bombs into the Chinese Consulate General in Fukuoka in southwestern Japan on Monday.
					
					 Hong said every country should protect foreign organizations and citizens there from danger, adding that the perpetrators should be punished by law.

articles.title: Russian President Refers to Significance of Strategic Exercises
articles.content:
Russian President Refers to Significance of Strategic Exercises
 Moscow, September 20 (KCNA) -- Russian President Vladimir Putin at a ceremony on Sept. 17 referred to the significance of strategic exercises Kavkaz-2012
					 He underscored the need to improve all the important factors of modern war, round off the officers and soldiers' readiness and qualifications, form a new appearance of overall armed forces and reinforce the nation's defense potential through the exercises.
					
					 There is a single requirement of the exercises, that is, to show that armed forces are ready to protect the interests of the state and deal decisive blows at any provocation and threat to the state's security, he noted.
					
					 Every serviceman taking part in the drills is successfully fulfilling his combat duty to defend the country, he said, adding that those faithful to their duties and true experts who know the true worth of bravery and self-sacrificing spirit have always been pillars of ground and naval forces of Russia.

articles.title: Russia Reacts to US Strategy to Dominate Asia-Pacific
articles.content:
Russia Reacts to US Strategy to Dominate Asia-Pacific
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Russia is proactively reacting to the U.S. strategy for military domination over the Asia-Pacific region with vigilance, drawing public attention.
					 As already known, the present U.S. administration is advocating its military strategy called "return to Asia-Pacific" viewed as a U-turn because its strategy for world domination veiled with "anti-terrorism" faced a total fiasco in the Mideast and other regions.
					
					 According to the strategy, the U.S. has already deployed 60 percent of its naval forces in the above-said region.
					
					 It is reported that a large number of cruisers, destroyers and submarines including six aircraft carriers are deployed in the region.
					
					 The U.S. is contemplating advancing a proposal for transfer and deployment of other services and arms as early as possible.
					
					 In a word, it is the unanimous view of media that the U.S. is stepping up its moves to hold a military edge in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 Lurking behind such switchover in its strategy is an ulterior intention to militarily overpower its rivals and major enemy forces in the region where strategic and geopolitical importance increases as the days go by and thus remove obstacles lying in the way of realizing its wild ambition for world domination.
					
					 It is precisely Russia that the U.S. regards as its major rival.
					
					 The U.S. has conducted an offensive to elbow Russia from the Balkans, Eastern Europe and Central Asia. Now it seeks to round off a network of siege to the country by laying a springboard from which to blockade against the Far Eastern region by force of arms.
					
					 In pursuance of the U.S. strategy to dominate the Asia-Pacific region the U.S.-Japan-south Korea military alliance has grown to be "NATO of Asian version" and the moves for deploying the "missile defence system of Asian version" have been pushed forward in real earnest. This is posing a threat to the Far Eastern region and, furthermore, Russia's interests in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 Availing itself of the U.S. switchover in its military strategy, Japan has become evermore undisguised in tightening the military nexus with the U.S., in particular. This brings to light its attempt to stand in a showdown with Russia over the territorial dispute surrounding the Southern Kuriles, making the issue serious.
					
					 Russia is taking hard-line military counter-measures to cope with the grave situation created by the U.S. strategy to dominate Asia-Pacific. As far as research, development and deployment of latest type military hardware are concerned, it puts main emphasis on bolstering up its forces in the Far East.
					
					 There was successful first test-flight of fifth generation fighter of Russia T-50 in a city along its Eastern border. The imaginary target of this fighter was U.S. F-22. Experts said such test-flight conducted in the air over the area near the Pacific suggested Russia's determination not to make any slight concession in the Far East.
					
					 Russia declared that it would deploy in Kamchatka of the Far Eastern region ground to air missile C-400 and new-type amphibious warfare ships urgently needed for attack and defence of island. Anti-aircraft missile Tor-M2 and helicopter gunships Mi-28 were also deployed in dispute-torn islets between Russia and Japan.
					
					 In recent years Russia deployed more than 100 types of warplanes in the Eastern military district which was described as the first large-scale military deployment. 
					
					 Foreign press reports said the purpose of the above-said deployment is aimed to counter Japan ostensively but its real aim is to stand up against the U.S. behind it and this was an expression of Moscow's firm will to defend the Far East.
					
					 Timed to coincide with its deployment, Russia is giving spurs to the construction of military bases in the region.
					
					 The Russian Pacific Fleet plans to build a large naval port in Kunashir, one of the dispute-torn islands. It embarked on putting into practice the project for beefing up its forces stationed in the Kuriles.
					
					 The building of a space launching centre in Vostochnii is making rapid progress. It is said that the launching centre will contribute to raising the IT level of the Russian forces.
					
					 More missile launching bases are expected to be transferred to the Far East. It is the view of analysts that this will not only promote the construction of overall military bases in the region but pose a direct threat to the U.S. forces in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 Russia is also demonstrating its military muscle under various codenames as a challenge to the U.S. strategy for dominating Asia-Pacific.
					
					 A typical example of this was the fact that Russia staged large-scale strategic operational exercises in 18 drill grounds with almost all services, arms and units involved under the command of the Russian Chief of the General Staff at a time when the U.S. just began carrying out its new strategy. Military analysts described these drills as a message to the U.S. that the interests of Russia can never be disregarded in the Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					 Sources predict that the confrontation between Russia and the U.S. will be further escalated in the future with the Asia-Pacific region as a theatre.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje a su homologo de Armenia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje a su homologo de Armenia
Pyongyang, 21 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 21 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Armenia, Serge Sarkissian, con motivo de la fiesta nacional de este pais.
					El remitente expresa su conviccion de que se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad entre la RPDC y Armenia y desea al destinatario los exitos en su trabajo para el desarrollo y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Malta
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Malta
Pyongyang, 21 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 21 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Malta, George Abela, en ocasion del 48o aniversario de la independencia de este pais.
					  En su misiva, el remitente desea al destinatario y a su pueblo los exitos en sus labores para el desarrollo y la prosperidad del pais.
					
					  Expresa su conviccion de que las relaciones entre la RPDC y Malta se desarrollaran conforme a los intereses comunes y deseos de los pueblos de los dos paises.

articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun felicita a su homologo nicaraguense 
 Pyongyang, 21 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Ui Chun, envio el dia 21 un mensaje de felicitacion a su homologo de Nicaragua, Samuel Santos Lopez, con motivo del 191o aniversario de la independencia de este pais latinoamericano.

articles.title: Inaugurado XIII Festival Internacional de Cine de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Inaugurado XIII Festival Internacional de Cine de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 21 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurado el dia 20 en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este el XIII Festival Internacional de Cine de Pyongyang. 
					El presente festival se realiza en la emulacion de largometrajes, documentales y cortometrajes, la proyeccion especial, la de preestreno, etc. 
					
					En la ocasion se llevaran a la pantalla mas de 90 cines presentados por mas de 50 entidades de mas de 30 paises.
					
					En el acto participaron el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema Yang Hyong Sop, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, el ministro de Cultura y titular del comote organizador del festival, Hong Kwang Sun, el presidente del Comite Popular de la Ciudad de Pyongyang Cha Hui Rim y otros funcionarios, las delegaciones, los delegados y los jurados internacionales participantes en el certamen. 
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos y otros miembros de las embajadas de varios paises e integrantes de las representaciones de las organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea. 
					
					En la ocasion se proyecto un video alusivo a las peliculas presentadas en el presente festival. 
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra inaugural, Hong Kwang Sun expuso su conviccion de que en medio del activo y sincero apoyo y colaboracion de todos los participantes se realizara con exito el Festival Internacional de Cine de Pyongyang que vino desarrollandose sin cesar bajo el ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad.
					
					En su discurso de felicitacion, Daniel Otto, delegado aleman, dijo que el festival quedo inaugurado con exito bajo la profunda atencion de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un, el Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el gobierno coreano. 
					
					Se presentaron los jurados internacionales del presente certamen.
					
					El comite organizador del festival ofrecio ese dia en el Restaurante Okryu un banquete en honor de los participantes en el certamen.

articles.title: Maniacos belicos no evitaran derrota, senala ACNC
articles.content:
Maniacos belicos no evitaran derrota, senala ACNC
Pyongyang, 21 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Segun informaciones extranjeras, Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos desarrollaron el entrenamiento tendente a atacar preventivamente y ocupar la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en el marco de los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Ulji Freedom Guardian" efectuados en agosto pasado.
					 Asi volvio a revelarse a todo el mundo el caracter enganoso de la sofisteria de los enemigos que lo califican de "entrenamiento anual de defensa".
					
					  Frente a la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y nueva situacion militar y politica creada en la Peninsula Coreana, la RPDC ya aclaro la posicion sobre el presente simulacro de guerra agresiva.
					
					  La inspeccion del Comandante Supremo            Kim Jong Un a las unidades de defensa de islas situadas en la extremidad meridional del frente suroeste y su orden de combate por la reunificacion de la patria devinieron una gran declaracion historica que refleja la demanda de la situacion dada y la voluntad de todo el ejercito y el pueblo de aniquilar a los enemigos.
					
					  La declaracion del Comandante Insigne sin par que conmovio a todo el mundo y la voluntad de la Corea del Songun de dar represalia convirtieron en un instante en una espuma el intento de los enemigos de provocar la nueva guerra aprovechando la oportunidad de dichos ejercicios. En visperas del inicio de las operaciones, los enemigos ya perdieron la iniciativa.
					
					  EE.UU. que actuaba arrogantemente y la banda titere que fanfarroneaba apoyandose en la fuerza de su amo gringo, perdieron completamente el animo desde el principio de simulacro.
					
					  En la "etapa decisiva" de dicha campana belica estaban confundidos avisando la suspension y la reanudacion de entrenamiento so pretexto del "dano por tifon" y al fin lo terminaron sin el resultado concreto.
					
					  Los maniacos de guerra volvieron a sufrir la verguenza ante el mundo.
					
					  Pero, ellos, sin sacar la leccion de su derrota, siguen recurriendo a la politica hostil anti-RPDC y la politica belica y acechan la oportunidad de desatar la nueva guerra.
					
					  Sueltan oficialmente los disparates provocativos: "se perfecciono el guion real" a traves del presente simulacro en que se aplico la concepcion de "derecho  de autodefensa preventiva".
					
					  Inculcan el fervor de guerra difundiendo ya el rumor de que dicho guion de guerra se aplicara tambien en los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" que se efectuaran a principios del proximo ano.
					
					  Los ejercicios belicos que se desarrollan  de continuo despues de "Ulji Freedom Guardian" en el cielo, la tierra y el mar de la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno y los medios de guerra nuclear insinuan que se acerca cada dia el momento de la guerra decisiva  antiyanqui.
					
					  La RPDC no estara nunca con los brazos cruzados ante las cada dia mas crecientes maniobras hostiles de EE.UU. y hara frente con iniciativa y mas activamente a ellas fortaleciendo el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa.
					
					  !A provocacion de los enemigos con el inmediato contraataque, a la guerra agresiva con la justa gran guerra por la reunificacion de la patria!, esto es la respuesta de la Corea del Songun.
					
					Si los enemigos se atreven a disparar un solo proyectil al territorio de la RPDC, las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias coreanas lo extenderan a la guerra por la reunificacion de la patria sin perder esta oportunidad de oro.
					
					La gran guerra por la reunificacion de la patria brillara como gran empresa justa para extirpar de raiz el origen de todos los males de esta Tierra y como proezas militares a elogiarse para siempre junto con la historia.
